Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO LOCAL GOVERNMENT

Title: Authorizes the town of Niagara to alienate and discontinue the use of certain parklands and to convey such parklands to Rajendra Sharma
Summary: Authorizes the town of Niagara to alienate and discontinue the use of certain parklands.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to authorizing the town of Niagara to alienate and discontinue the use of certain parklands and to convey such parklands to Rajendra Sharma
